name: Balancing Scooter
description:
Our game is about the balancing scooter simulator. Players play as an office worker
who uses a balance scooter to go to the company through the city. At the same time there will
be collectable bananas along the way. 

Mechanics:
1. Use “WASD” keys to control the movement of the balancing scooter.
2. Use the arrow keys to balance the office worker who is standing on the balancing
scooter.
3. Players successfully reach the destination will win the game(with or without the
person on top of the scooter).
